content.heroIntro: Welcome to MI CASA QUESADA, an exceptional residential development by MI CASA AS CONSTRUCIONES located in the heart of Ciudad Quesada, Rojales, Alicante. This premium project showcases 4-bedroom villas featuring 199m² of contemporary living space built on 274m² private plots, with prices starting from just €499,000. Each villa is meticulously designed to combine modern comfort with Spanish coastal living, featuring air conditioning pre-installation, fitted kitchens with quality appliances, and elegant bathroom fixtures. Set for delivery on 01-10-2025, MI CASA QUESADA represents an outstanding opportunity to acquire a new-build home in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after communities. The development benefits from MI CASA AS CONSTRUCIONES' proven expertise in delivering quality homes that appreciate at 8% year-on-year. With an established international community, English-speaking amenities, and proximity to stunning Blue Flag beaches and championship golf courses, this is the ideal sanctuary for discerning buyers seeking both lifestyle and investment value.

locationSection.intro: Ciudad Quesada in Rojales has emerged as one of Costa Blanca's most desirable residential destinations, attracting an international community of property seekers and investors. This purpose-built community combines the convenience of modern infrastructure with the relaxed Mediterranean lifestyle that defines the region. Rojales itself is a charming inland town with authentic Spanish character, yet remains strategically positioned to offer quick access to beaches, airports, and major amenities. The area is renowned for its stable property market, with consistent year-on-year appreciation of 8%, making it an intelligent investment choice. International residents appreciate the established expat networks, English-speaking services, and the perfect balance between vibrant social life and peaceful suburban living. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday home, or investment property, Ciudad Quesada offers compelling advantages backed by strong market fundamentals and quality of life that rivals premium Spanish island destinations, yet at 40% lower costs.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in MI CASA QUESADA?
faqs.answer: From €499,000. MI CASA QUESADA offers luxury 4-bedroom villas with 199m² of living space on 274m² private plots. Each property features a private swimming pool, landscaped gardens, and premium finishes. Contact our team for current availability and viewing appointments.

faqs.answer: MI CASA AS CONSTRUCIONES is the developer. They maintain an established track record building quality homes throughout Rojales and the surrounding Costa Blanca region, with satisfied international clients across Europe.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes. Costa Blanca offers excellent value, strong market fundamentals, and outstanding lifestyle benefits. Property values show consistent 8% year-on-year appreciation. The region attracts international buyers seeking Mediterranean living with easy airport access, healthcare facilities, and established expat communities.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes. Non-resident foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain without restrictions or visas. You will need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) for the purchase process. Our team assists with all legal documentation and financial requirements.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect approximately 10-12% in additional costs including transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees, registry fees, and legal costs. MI CASA QUESADA at €499,000 means total costs around €55,000-60,000. We provide complete cost breakdowns during consultation.

faqs.question: How far is MI CASA QUESADA from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20 minutes' drive, providing easy access to pristine Mediterranean coastline. Popular nearby beaches include Playa Flamenca and Punta Prima, perfect for swimming, water sports, and beach leisure.

faqs.question: What amenities are near MI CASA QUESADA?
faqs.answer: Excellent amenities include: Shopping at Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets; Healthcare at regional hospitals within 30 minutes and private clinics; Golf at several championship courses nearby; Entertainment and dining at numerous restaurants and local markets; International schools with British curriculum options.
